# `degrees`

Radian/degree conversions


## Description

Convert radians to degrees and vice versa


## Usage

```r
radians(deg)
degrees(rad)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`deg`     |     degrees
`rad`     |     radians
